assistants.name: iFinder Assistant
assistants.description: Your expert for iFinder-related questions. Get help with configuration, features, and best practices.

defaultConfig.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your iFinder Assistant. I can help you with questions about iFinder features, configuration, and best practices. What would you like to know?

assistants.name: Support Assistant
assistants.description: Get help with technical issues, troubleshooting, and general support questions.

defaultConfig.welcomeMessage: Hi there! I'm your Support Assistant. I can help you with technical issues and troubleshooting. How can I assist you today?

assistants.name: Documentation Guide
assistants.description: Navigate through documentation, find specific information, and understand complex topics.

defaultConfig.welcomeMessage: Welcome! I'm your Documentation Guide. I can help you find and understand specific documentation. What are you looking for?
